1.text: Sand down the top layer of each nail with a nail file.

2.text: Soak cotton balls in pure acetone.

3.text: Wrap your nails in foil to hold the cotton balls in place.

4.text: Wait 10-15 minutes for the nails to soak in the acetone.

5.text: Remove the foil and cotton balls from your nails.

6.text: File the surface of each of your nails.

7.text: Fill a large bowl or dish with hot water.

8.text: Place 1-2 smaller bowls in the hot water for soaking.

9.text: Dip a paper towel in acetone and place it in the smaller dish.

10.text: Soak your nails in the dish for 10-15 minutes.

11.text: Wipe off the powder nails with a paper towel.
